lead_paragraph: South Africa have dropped veteran flyhalf Morne Steyn for their tour of Europe next month and included four uncapped players for tests against England, Italy and Wales.

headline.print_headline: Steyn Dropped From Bok Squad for European Tour
headline.main: Steyn Dropped From Bok Squad for European Tour
